mapper.insert: insert into wedding(wed_hall, wed_title, wed_min, wed_max, wed_txt, wed_txt2, wed_fname, wed_size, wed_food, wed_direct, wed_type) values(#{wed_hall}, #{wed_title}, #{wed_min}, #{wed_max}, #{wed_txt}, #{wed_txt2}, #{wed_fname}, #{wed_size}, #{wed_food}, #{wed_direct}, #{wed_type})
mapper.select: select * from wedding order by id desc
